name: Words within words that start with MAN Trivia Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

PRE + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

MAN + To grow older = To cope with.
MAN + To leave for somewhere else = A juicy tropical fruit.
MAN + The day of the year = An authoritative command or instruction.
MAN + A small area of woodland = A dense thicket of evergreen shrubs on a tropical shore.
MAN + A male duck = A plant used in the Harry Potter series to restore those who have been petrified.
MAN + Completely = In a brave and masculine manner.
MAN + Related by blood = A small colourful bird.
MAN + The killing of animals for food = Homicide without previous intent.
MAN + A rotating device used to make holes = A large baboon.
MAN + A primitive outing to collect food = An extensive search for a fugitive.
